vv50:13.4: agañchiṃ → gacchiṃ (bj, pts2) | āgacchiṃ (s2, s3, mr) | agacchiṃ (pts1), udahāriyā → udakahāriyā (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2)
vv50:14.4: attho → kīvatthopi (s2, pts1) | kvatthopi (s3, pts2) | kvatthosi (mr)
vv50:24.3: Dukkha → ayaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1-2), nirodho maggo ca → dukkhanirodho ca (s2, s3)
